thread.title: Ed Sheeran hosts MTV European music awards in Milan
thread.title_full: Ed Sheeran hosts MTV European music awards in Milan

title: Ed Sheeran hosts MTV European music awards in Milan
text:
Ed Sheeran hosts MTV European music awards in Milan By COLLEEN BARRYAssociated Press 
MILAN (AP) - Ed Sheeran is facing a busy night Sunday, acting as host, nominee and performer as the music and fashion industries light up Italy's fashion capital of Milan for the MTV EMAs European music awards. 
Pharrell Williams is the lead performer at the award ceremony, joined also by Justin Bieber, who is up for six awards, Ellie Goulding and newcomer James Bay, among others. 
Williams, Sheeran and Bieber will be vying for the best male vocalist award, along with Jason Derulo and Kanye West. Taylor Swift leads all artists with nine nominations, including for best female vocalist. She is up against Goulding, Miley Cyrus, Nicki Minaj and Rihanna. 
New Wave rockers Duran Duran are being honored with the first-ever MTV video visionary award honoring music video pioneers. MTV said "their distinctive style has had an undeniable impact on music history." 
The awards ceremony travels to a different European city each year and winners are selected by fans across the continent. Along with Sheeran, the Milan ceremony is being hosted by model and actress Ruby Rose. 
___ 
This story corrects the name of the ceremony to the MTV EMAs. Copyright 2015 The Associated Press. All rights reserved. This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten or redistributed.
